summary: The customer service agent provided the customer with information about Contoso Wireless' internet service packages, which range from 50 Mbps for $59.99 per month to 100 Mbps for $79.99 per month. The customer was also informed of promotional offers and bundle packages that can help make the services more affordable. The agent also mentioned that all packages come with unlimited data usage and no long-term contracts or hidden fees, and that customers need a modem and router in order to use the service, which can be purchased separately or from Contoso Wireless for an additional fee.
